```{r}
# working on installing the packages
av <- available.packages(filters=list())
av[av[, "Package"] == pkg, ]

# installing the packages 

install.packages("TENxPBMCData")
install.packages("celldex")

# loading the reference packages and assigning specific datasets to variables to be used by SingleR

library(TENxPBMCData) # loads the package into the R environment
available_datasets <- listData() # gets a list of the available datasets
print(available_datasets)


new.data <- TENxPBMCData("pbmc4") # using the function TENxPBMCData from the TENxPBMCData package to load a specific dataset



library(celldex)
ref.data <- HumanPrimaryCellAtlasData(emsembl=TRUE) 


```
